articles.description: The vast majority of hospitals across the UK have failed to adopt an £11 test to detect whether pregnant women are carrying a potentially deadly bacteria, despite national guidelines.An investigation
articles.content:
The vast majority of hospitals across the UK have failed to adopt an £11 test to detect whether pregnant women are carrying a potentially deadly bacteria, despite national guidelines.

articles.author: Eleanor Hayward
articles.title: Deadly toll of scrapped cancer surgery is revealed - Daily Mail
articles.description: Tens of thousands of cancer patients have missed out on potentially lifesaving treatment. Surgery to remove tumours plummeted by one third during the first wave of coronavirus.
articles.content:
The devastating toll of the pandemic on cancer patients is laid bare today.
Tens of thousands have missed out on potentially lifesaving treatment, official figures reveal.

articles.author: Yohannes Lowe
articles.title: UK Covid-19 patients dying needlessly due to unfounded fears about ventilators - The Guardian
articles.description: Some critically ill people are refusing intubation, wrongly associating it with higher risk of death, say doctors
articles.content:
Critically ill Covid patients are dying unnecessarily because they are refusing to go on ventilators due to unfounded fears that the machines increase the risk of death, senior doctors have warned.
